kTitle: Surat al-Kahf is one of the suras that is desirable to read on Friday
kContent: About Abu Sa'id al-Khadari, may Allah be pleased with him: 'Whoever reads the surah of the cave on Friday is illuminated by the light between the two Fridays'.
eTitle: Reading Surat al-Ikhlas modifies the reading of one-third of the Qur'an
eContent: That is, in remuneration and reward, it has been proven that the Prophet (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him) said: 'Cannot any of you read one third of the Qur'an on the night? They said: How to read a third of the Qur'an? He said, Say, 'Allah is one who amends one-third of the Qur'an.'
hadith: Abu Hurayrah (may Allah be pleased with him) narrated directly from the Prophet (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) that he said: “Whoever says 'SUBHANALLAH WABIHAMDH' one hundred times, his sins will be unloaded from him, even if they were as much as the foam of the sea.”
IR: The prayer of the Istikhara dua
sleepingDua: Bismika rabbee wadaAAtu janbee wabika arfaAAuh, fa-in amsakta nafsee farhamha, wa-in arsaltaha fahfathha bima tahfathu bihi AAibadakas-saliheen.
wakeUpDua: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee ahyana baAAda ma amatana wa-ilayhin-nushoor.
MED: Asbahnaa wa 'asbahal-mulku ('Amsaynaa wa'amsal-mulku) lillaahi walhamdu lillaahi, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer. Rabbi 'as'aluka khayra maa fee haathal-yawmi (maa fee haathyl-lila) wa khayra maa ba'dahu wa 'a'oothu bika min sharri maa fee haathal-yawmi (maa fee haathyl-lila) wa sharri maa ba'dahu(wa sharri maa ba'dahaa), Rabbi 'a'oothu bika minal-kasali, wa soo'il-kibari, Rabbi 'a'oothu bika min 'athaabin fin-naari wa 'athaabin fil-qabri._, (Recite in the bracket in the evening.)
askAllahAfia: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'alukal-'afwa wal'aafiyata fid-dunyaa wal'aakhirati, Allaahumma 'innee 'as'alukal-'afwa wal'aafiyata fee deenee wa dunyaaya wa 'ahlee, wa maalee , Allaahum-mastur 'awraatee, wa 'aamin raw'aatee, Allaahum-mahfadhnee min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfee, wa 'an yameenee, wa 'an shimaalee, wa min fawqee, wa 'a'oothu bi'adhamatika 'an 'ughtaala min tahtee.
seydulEstigfar: Bismillaahil-lathee laa yadhurru ma'as-mihi shay'un fil-'ardhi wa laa fis-samaa'i wa Huwas-Samee 'ul- 'Aleem. (3times)
seekRefuge: A'outh bekalimat Allah Itamate min sharri ma khalaq
InTheNameOfAllah: Allaahumma 'Anta Rabbee laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta, khalaqtanee wa 'anaa 'abduka, wa 'anaa 'alaa 'ahdika wa wa'dika mas-tata'tu, 'a'oothu bika min sharri maa sana'tu, 'aboo'u laka bini'matika 'alayya, wa 'aboo'u bithanbee faghfir lee fa'innahu laa yaghfiruth-thunooba 'illaa 'Anta.
DE1: (Allaahumma innee astakheeruka bi ilmika, wa astaqdiruka biqudratika, wa as aluka min fadhtikal- Adheemi, fa innaka taqdiru wa laa aqdiru, wa ta lamu, wa laa a lamu, wa Anta Allaamul-Ghuyoobi.)
DE2: ( Allaahumma in kunta ta lamu anna haathal- amra-[then mention the thing to be decided] Khayrun lee fee deenee wa ma aashee wa aaqibati amree – [or say] Aajilihi wa aajilihi – Faqdurhu lee wa yassirhu lee thumma baarik lee feehi, wa in kunta ta lamu anna haathal- amra sharrun lee fee deenee wa ma aashee wa aaqibati amree – [or say] Aajilihi wa aajilihi – Fasrifhu annee wasrifnee anhu waqdur liyal-khayra haythu kaana thumma ardhinee bihi.)
RAP1: Astaghfirul-lah (three times) Allahumma antas-salam waminkas-salam, tabarakta ya thal-jalali wal-ikram.,
RAP2: La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer, allahumma la maniAAa lima aAAtayt, wala muAAtiya lima manaAAt, wala yanfaAAu thal-jaddi minkal-jad,
RAP3: La ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer. la hawla wala quwwata illa billah, la ilaha illal-lah, wala naAAbudu illa iyyah, lahun-niAAmatu walahul-fadl walahuth-thana-ol- hasan, la ilaha illal-lah mukhliseena lahud-deen walaw karihal-kafiroon.,
RAP4: Subhanal-lah walhamdu lillah, wallahu akbar (thirty-three times). La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer.,
RAP5: Reading surah Al-Ikhlas, Al-Falaq, and An-nas (3 times After fajr and magrib prayers. After the other prayers 1 time.),
RAP7: La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, yuhyee wayumeet, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer.(ten times after the maghrib & fajr prayers)
AF1: Prophet also (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) said: “Whoever says, ten times:(lillah ILLA Allah WAHDOH LA SHARIK LH LAHULMULK WALHUALHAMD WAHOA ALAKUL SHYUN QADEER); will be as though he emancipated four slaves from the offspring of Isma‘īl.”
AF2: Messenger of Allah (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) said: “There are two phrases that are dear to the Most Merciful, light on the tongue, and heavy on the scale: (SUBHANALLAH WABIHAMDH, SUBHANALLAH ALAZEEM).”
AF3: Messenger of Allah (may Allah’s peace and blessings be upon him) said: When I say: '(SUBHANALLAH, WALHAMDULILLAH, WLILLAH ILLA ALLAH, WAALLAHU AKBAR),' this is more beloved to me than all that the sun rises upon.
AF4: Messenger of Allah (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) when he said: 'Is anyone of you unable to earn one thousand good deeds each day?' One of those present asked: 'How can one earn one thousand good deeds?' He replied: (By glorifying Allah(saying SUBHANALLAH) one hundred times, one thousand good deeds will be added to his record, or one thousand sins will be removed from his record.)
AF5: ((Whoever said: SUBHANALLAH ALAZEEM WABIHAMDH planted a palm tree for him in Paradise)
AF6: The Prophet (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him) said: 'O Abdullah ibn Qais, shall I not show you a treasure of paradise'? I said, Yes, O Messenger of Allah, he said, '(say LA HAWULA WLAQUATA ILLA BILLAH).'
AF7: Prophet (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) said: 'The most beloved speech to Allah is four, and you may start with any of them':(SUBHANALLAH, WALHUALHAMD, Wlillah ILLA Allah, WAALLAHU AKBAR .)
AF8: the Prophet (may Allah's peace and blessings be upon him) said: The lasting good deeds are the statements:(LA ILLAH ILLA Allah, WASUBHANALLAH, WAALLAHU AKBAR, WALHAMDULILLAH, WLAHAWLA WLAQUATA ILLA BILLAH).
msg2: Do not put device close to metal object.
msg3: Calibrate the compass eveytime you use it.
